role_description: An Ansible role that installs lexicon (a tool/library to manipulate DNS records) on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [Lexicon](https://github.com/AnalogJ/lexicon) provides a way to manipulate DNS records on multiple DNS providers in a standardized/agnostic way.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs lexicon (a tool/library to manipulate DNS records) on nearly any platform.
